price: Na hakika bila ya shaka haya yamo katika Vitabu vya kale.
footnotes: Na hakika kuitaja Qur'ani na kueleza kuwa inatoka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu kumteremshia Muhammad s.a.w. yametajwa katika Vitabu vya Manabii walio tangulia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
